course_description: Intro to computer networks based on internal structure using the OSI layer model. Topics include: physical layer, data link layer, the network layer (routing algorithms, IP protocol, tunneling), and transport layer (UDP and TCP protocols, NS2 network simulation). Berkeley socket and pthreads APIs.
prerequisites: CS 350 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 6172, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: S. La Fleur, Status: Open
